description: Welcome to Competitive Innovations, our weekly feature for a number of game lines across the tabletop wargame space. title: [40K] Competitive Innovations in 10th: Imperium Inbound pt.1

description: We’d like to thank Freecompany for providing us with a preview set of these models for review purposes. title: Eldfall Chronicles: Water Elementals Model Review (and How to Paint Them)
